arts.ttl: Bologna fans criticise Ultras Investigation amid club debt concerns

Bologna have won their last two games against Parma in Serie A (both in the 2020/21 season), and have never achieved three wins in a row against the Gialloblù in the top-flight. Bologna are unbeaten in their last nine games (W4 D5) against Parma in Serie A, already a record streak for the Rossoblù against the Ducali in the tournament; the last win for the Gialloblù in this Emilian derby in the top-flight dates to December 2012 (2-1 comeback at the Dall`Ara, with goals from Jaime Valdés and Nicola Sansone, after the Rossoblù had taken the lead via Frederik Sörensen).

arts.ttl: Beukema shines for Bologna, attracting Premier League Interest and national team call-up
arts.sum: Bologna’s Dutch center-back Sam Beukema continues to impress with his performances, most recently in a convincing display against Liverpool at Anfield. Despite conceding goals to McAllister and Salah, Beukema’s performance caught the eye of Premier League scouts in attendance. La Gazzetta dello Sport report how the 25-year-old defender, who joined Bologna two summers ago from AZ Alkmaar for €7.5 million, has developed significantly under coach Thiago Motta. His growth has not gone unnoticed, with several European clubs already monitoring his progress since last season.
